name: clubs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool premier_league_upcoming_matches.
Tool description: This API will provide you information about future matches of different clubs in Premier League
API description: This API will supply client info about all clubs that are playing the First Premier League Competition

abbr.description: The abbreviation of the club. Default is 'ARS'.

name.description: The name of the club. Default is 'Arsenal'.
